department.dept_long_name: Department of Molecular and Cellular Biology

course.title: Introduction to Connectomics
course.faculty_text: Jeff W. Lichtman and R. Clay Reid (Medical School)
course.description: Focuses on how the tools of connectomics (nanoscale imaging, nanoscale and microscale cutting, fluorescent and electron-dense staining, image analysis algorithms) generate data about neural connectivity. Case studies: C. elegans, neuromuscular junction, retina, cortex.
course.notes: This course will be taught by Harvard and MIT faculty, alternating meeting locations on both the Harvard and MIT campuses.
